GK19bhakiriu:2179: pragalbham ātmā dhuri dhurya vāgmināṃ BhKir_14.6c
GK19bhakiriu:2181: pracchannam apy ūhayate hi ceṣṭā BhKir_16.19d
GK19bhakiriu:2183: prajāsu vṛttiṃ yam ayuṅkta veditum BhKir_1.1b
GK19bhakiriu:2187: praṇatim atha vidhāya prasthitāḥ sadmanas tāḥ BhKir_6.47a
GK19bhakiriu:2219: pratihatam atir eti ghorāṃ gatim BhKir_18.26b
GK19bhakiriu:2222: pratīpam āgatya kim u svam āyudham BhKir_14.60d
GK19bhakiriu:2241: pradhvaṃsam eti vyathitāc ca tejaḥ BhKir_17.16b
GK19bhakiriu:2243: prapitsoḥ kiṃ ca te muktiṃ BhKir_11.16a
GK19bhakiriu:2247: prabhavati na tadā paro vijetuṃ BhKir_10.35a
GK19bhakiriu:2280: praviśya hi ghnanti śaṭhās tathāvidhān BhKir_1.30c
GK19bhakiriu:2287: praśama iva śrutam āsanaṃ narendraḥ BhKir_2.58d
GK19bhakiriu:2321: prasedivāṃsaṃ na tam āpa kopaḥ BhKir_17.23a
GK19bhakiriu:2347: prāpyate yad iha dūram agatvā BhKir_18.25a
GK19bhakiriu:2352: prāyeṇa saty api hitārthakare vidhau hi BhKir_5.49c
GK19bhakiriu:2356: prāha te nu sadṛśī divaukasām BhKir_13.37c
GK19bhakiriu:2362: priyam iyatī hy abalājanasya bhūmiḥ BhKir_10.58d
GK19bhakiriu:2363: priyam iva kathayiṣyann āliliṅga sphurantīṃ BhKir_3.60c
GK19bhakiriu:2386: prīte pinākini mayā saha lokapālair BhKir_11.81a
GK19bhakiriu:2388: prekṣākārī yāti padaṃ muktam apāyaiḥ BhKir_18.28b
GK19bhakiriu:2389: prema kām api bhuvaṃ pramadānām BhKir_9.71d
GK19bhakiriu:2415: babhāra ramyo 'pi vapuḥ sa bhīṣaṇaṃ BhKir_3.56c
GK19bhakiriu:2418: babhūva bhūyān iva tatra pāvakaḥ BhKir_16.59d
GK19bhakiriu:2424: balaṃ nirastaṃ na rarāja jiṣṇunā BhKir_14.63d
GK19bhakiriu:2425: balaṃ prakopād iva viṣvag āyatā BhKir_14.59b
GK19bhakiriu:2427: balād alabhyaṃ tava lipsate nṛpaḥ BhKir_14.19b
GK19bhakiriu:2430: balinaś ca vadhād ṛte 'sya śakyaṃ BhKir_13.13c
GK19bhakiriu:2434: bahir antaś ca nṛpasya maṇḍalam BhKir_2.53b
GK19bhakiriu:2463: bhaṅgaḥ sa jiṣṇor dhṛtim unmamātha BhKir_17.29d
GK19bhakiriu:2464: bhayam ity eṣa na bhūtaye 'bhimānaḥ BhKir_13.7b
GK19bhakiriu:2487: bhavanti māyāviṣu ye na māyinaḥ BhKir_1.30b
GK19bhakiriu:2488: bhavanti vaśyāḥ svayam eva dehinaḥ BhKir_1.33b
GK19bhakiriu:2491: bhavavītaye na hi tathā sa vidhiḥ BhKir_6.44c
GK19bhakiriu:2495: bhavān mā sma vadhīn nyāyyaṃ BhKir_11.30c
GK19bhakiriu:2496: bhaved api svasti carācarāya vā BhKir_14.62b
GK19bhakiriu:2499: bhavyo bhavann api muner iha śāsanena BhKir_5.49a
GK19bhakiriu:2515: bhīṣme 'py asambhāvyam idaṃ gurau vā BhKir_16.23c
GK19bhakiriu:2526: bhūtasaṃgha iva na tvam upetaḥ BhKir_18.34b
GK19bhakiriu:2544: bhṛśam aratim avāpya tatra cāsyās BhKir_10.49c
GK19bhakiriu:2548: bhṛśam āsevitayā ruṣā na muktaḥ BhKir_13.5b
GK19bhakiriu:2571: matam eṣāṃ na vilaṅghayanti ye BhKir_2.45b
GK19bhakiriu:2579: madanam upadadhe sa eva tāsāṃ BhKir_10.40c
GK19bhakiriu:2586: madād iva praskhalataḥ pade pade BhKir_8.22d
GK19bhakiriu:2595: manasaḥ prasattim iva mūrdhni gireḥ BhKir_6.17c
GK19bhakiriu:2628: mayā mṛgān hantur anena hetunā BhKir_14.25a
GK19bhakiriu:2629: mayi tāṃ sutarām ayaṃ vidhatte BhKir_13.4c
GK19bhakiriu:2641: mahate phalāya tad avekṣya śivaṃ BhKir_6.28a
GK19bhakiriu:2642: mahate rujann api guṇāya mahān BhKir_6.7d
GK19bhakiriu:2669: mahīṃ gatau tāv iṣudhī tadānīṃ BhKir_17.47c
GK19bhakiriu:2678: mā kṛthāḥ punar amūm apakriyām BhKir_13.64b
GK19bhakiriu:2698: māyā svid eṣā mativibhramo vā BhKir_16.18a
GK19bhakiriu:2723: mukhaṃ svid etad vikasan nu paṅkajam BhKir_8.36b
GK19bhakiriu:2734: munitāvirodhi na ca nāsya rājate BhKir_12.27d
GK19bhakiriu:2740: munir asmi nirāgasaḥ kuto me BhKir_13.7a
GK19bhakiriu:2746: muner vicitrair iṣubhiḥ sa bhūyān BhKir_17.19a
GK19bhakiriu:2773: medinīpatir ayaṃ tathā ca te BhKir_13.51b
GK19bhakiriu:2781: yathā nije vartmani bhāti bhābhiś BhKir_17.57a
GK19bhakiriu:2791: yad āttha kāmaṃ bhavatā sa yācyatām BhKir_14.18a
GK19bhakiriu:2792: yadā vigṛhṇāti hataṃ tadā yaśaḥ BhKir_14.24a
GK19bhakiriu:2795: yadi manasi śamaḥ kim aṅga cāpaṃ BhKir_10.55a
GK19bhakiriu:2796: yadi labdhā punar ātmanaḥ padam BhKir_2.17b
GK19bhakiriu:2799: yad eva roddhuṃ ramaṇībhir añjanam BhKir_8.38b
GK19bhakiriu:2813: yal lokeṣv avikalam āptam ādhipatyam BhKir_18.36b
GK19bhakiriu:2820: yaś copāsti sādhu vidheyaṃ sa vidhatte BhKir_18.28d
GK19bhakiriu:2821: yaṣṭum icchasi pitṝn na sāmprataṃ BhKir_13.65a
GK19bhakiriu:2822: yas tyaktavān vaḥ sa vṛthā balād vā BhKir_3.13c
GK19bhakiriu:2863: yaiḥ prayānti mudam asya sūrayaḥ BhKir_13.47b
GK19bhakiriu:2865: yogaṃ ca taṃ yogyatamāya tasmai BhKir_3.26a
GK19bhakiriu:2872: yoṣitaḥ suhṛd iva sma ruṇaddhi BhKir_9.45c
GK19bhakiriu:2876: yoṣito na madirāṃ bhṛśam īṣuḥ BhKir_9.70c
GK19bhakiriu:2878: rakṣantas tapasi balaṃ ca lokapālāḥ BhKir_5.50c
GK19bhakiriu:2880: rakṣobhiḥ suramanujair diteḥ sutair vā BhKir_18.36a
GK19bhakiriu:2892: raṇāya jaitraḥ pradiśann iva tvarāṃ BhKir_14.28a
GK19bhakiriu:2898: ramyāṇāṃ vikṛtir api śriyaṃ tanoti BhKir_7.5d
GK19bhakiriu:2899: ramyā navadyutir apaiti na śādvalebhyaḥ BhKir_5.37a
GK19bhakiriu:2928: riktaḥ prakāśaś ca babhūva bhūmer BhKir_17.59c
GK19bhakiriu:3004: vadati hi saṃvṛtir eva kāmitāni BhKir_10.44d
GK19bhakiriu:3010: vadhūḥ śarīre 'sti na cāsti manmathaḥ BhKir_18.31b
GK19bhakiriu:3014: vanaje neti balaṃ bad asti sattve BhKir_13.8b

GK19bhakiriu:3049: valkam ajinam iti citram idaṃ BhKir_12.27c
GK19bhakiriu:3053: vasanti hi premṇi guṇā na vastuni BhKir_8.37d
GK19bhakiriu:3056: vasūni vāñchan na vaśī na manyunā BhKir_1.13a
GK19bhakiriu:3067: vāma eva surateṣv api kāmaḥ BhKir_9.49d
GK19bhakiriu:3096: vikṛtiḥ kiṃ nu bhaved iyaṃ nu māyā BhKir_13.4d
GK19bhakiriu:3124: vijayāyety alam anvaśān munir mām BhKir_13.13b
GK19bhakiriu:3125: vijayi vividham astraṃ lokapālā viteruḥ BhKir_18.46d
GK19bhakiriu:3131: vijitya yaḥ prājyam ayacchad uttarān BhKir_1.35a

GK19bhakiriu:3165: vidhuraṃ kim ataḥ paraṃ parair BhKir_2.7a
GK19bhakiriu:3166: vidhuvati dhanur āvir maṇḍalaṃ pāṇḍusūnau BhKir_14.65b
GK19bhakiriu:3179: vinā tanutreṇa ruciṃ sa bheje BhKir_17.46d
GK19bhakiriu:3225: vimalaṃ nabho rajasi vṛṣṭir apām BhKir_6.33b
GK19bhakiriu:3230: viyati vane ca yathāyathaṃ vitene BhKir_10.18d
GK19bhakiriu:3243: virodhi siddher iti kartum udyataḥ BhKir_14.8a
GK19bhakiriu:3267: vivicya kiṃ prārthitam īśvareṇa te BhKir_14.20b
GK19bhakiriu:3280: viśvāsayaty āśu satāṃ hi yogaḥ BhKir_3.31d
GK19bhakiriu:3293: vismayaḥ ka iva vā jayaśriyā BhKir_13.40a
GK19bhakiriu:3301: vihāya śāntiṃ nṛpa dhāma tat punaḥ BhKir_1.42a
GK19bhakiriu:3316: vīryaṃ ca vidvatsu sute maghonaḥ BhKir_3.34c
GK19bhakiriu:3323: vṛthā kṛthā mānini mā pariśramam BhKir_8.7b
GK19bhakiriu:3342: vyathitam api bhṛśaṃ mano harantī BhKir_10.22a
GK19bhakiriu:3362: vraja jaya ripulokaṃ pādapadmānataḥ san BhKir_18.48a
GK19bhakiriu:3363: vrajati purā hi parāsutāṃ tvadarthe BhKir_10.50b
GK19bhakiriu:3364: vrajati śuci padaṃ tv ati prītimān BhKir_18.26a
GK19bhakiriu:3389: śaṭha viṣayās tava vallabhā na muktiḥ BhKir_10.55b
GK19bhakiriu:3403: śamena siddhiṃ munayo na bhūbhṛtaḥ BhKir_1.42d

GK19bhakiriu:3426: śarārtham eṣyaty atha lapsyate gatiṃ BhKir_14.25c
GK19bhakiriu:3482: śiva tasmai pavanātane namas te BhKir_18.37d
GK19bhakiriu:3498: śucibhir guṇair aghamayaṃ sa tamaḥ BhKir_6.20b
GK19bhakiriu:3508: śṛṅgāṇy amuṣya bhajate gaṇabhartur ukṣā BhKir_5.42c
GK19bhakiriu:3510: śṛṇāti yas tān prasabhena tasya te BhKir_14.13b
GK19bhakiriu:3521: śramam ādadhāv asukaraṃ na tapaḥ BhKir_6.19c
GK19bhakiriu:3523: śramo nu tāsāṃ madano nu paprathe BhKir_8.53d
GK19bhakiriu:3526: śriyam adhikaviśuddhāṃ vahnidāhād iva dyauḥ BhKir_16.62d
GK19bhakiriu:3536: śrutam apy adhigamya ye ripūn BhKir_2.41a
GK19bhakiriu:3556: sa kiṃsakhā sādhu na śāsti yo 'dhipaṃ BhKir_1.5a
GK19bhakiriu:3557: sakṛd vikṛṣṭād atha kārmukān muneḥ BhKir_14.53c
GK19bhakiriu:3559: saktiṃ lavād apanayaty anile latānāṃ BhKir_5.46a
GK19bhakiriu:3560: sa kṣattriyas trāṇasahaḥ satāṃ yas BhKir_3.48a
GK19bhakiriu:3561: sa khaṇḍanaṃ prāpya parād amarṣavān BhKir_17.60a
GK19bhakiriu:3562: sakhā sa yuktaḥ kathitaḥ kathaṃ tvayā BhKir_14.21a
GK19bhakiriu:3563: sakhi dayitam ihānayeti sā māṃ BhKir_10.47a
GK19bhakiriu:3571: sagandharmā dhāma tridaśavanitāḥ svaṃ pratiyayuḥ BhKir_10.63d
GK19bhakiriu:3573: sa cintayaty eva bhiyas tvad eṣyatīr BhKir_1.23c
GK19bhakiriu:3574: sacivaḥ śuddha ivādade ca bāṇaḥ BhKir_13.14d
GK19bhakiriu:3575: sa jagade vacanaṃ priyam ādarān BhKir_5.16c
GK19bhakiriu:3576: sa jagāma vismayam udvīkṣya puraḥ BhKir_6.15a
GK19bhakiriu:3596: satāṃ hi vāṇī guṇam eva bhāṣate BhKir_14.11d
GK19bhakiriu:3599: sa teṣu na sthānam avāpa śokaḥ BhKir_3.34d
GK19bhakiriu:3604: sa tvad vinā me hṛdayaṃ nikāraḥ BhKir_3.44d
GK19bhakiriu:3622: sa nipuṇam etya kayācid evam ūce BhKir_10.51d
GK19bhakiriu:3625: santi bhūbhṛti śarā hi naḥ pare BhKir_13.58c
GK19bhakiriu:3628: sapadi tad upaninye riktatāṃ nīlakaṇṭhaḥ BhKir_16.63d
GK19bhakiriu:3632: sa piṅgākṣaḥ śrīmān bhuvanamahanīyena mahasā BhKir_18.45a
GK19bhakiriu:3658: samam āgatāḥ sapadi vairam āpadaḥ BhKir_12.46d
GK19bhakiriu:3660: samaye yaś ca tanoti tigmatām BhKir_2.38b
GK19bhakiriu:3715: samprati labdhajanma śanakaiḥ katham api laghuni BhKir_5.43a
GK19bhakiriu:3720: samprāpnuyāṃ vijayam īśa yayā samṛddhyā BhKir_18.43c

GK19bhakiriu:3732: samyagdṛṣṭis tasya paraṃ paśyati yas tvāṃ BhKir_18.28c
GK19bhakiriu:3739: saritaḥ prahāsam iva phenam apām BhKir_6.10d
GK19bhakiriu:3749: sarvadā ka iva vā sahiṣyate BhKir_13.66b
GK19bhakiriu:3760: sa vāritaḥ kiṃ bhavatā na bhūpatiḥ BhKir_14.8b
GK19bhakiriu:3793: sasyande mada iva śīkaraḥ kareṇoḥ BhKir_7.33d
GK19bhakiriu:3802: sahasā bhayād iva rarāsa bhūdharaḥ BhKir_12.45d
GK19bhakiriu:3820: saṃgamaś ca dayitaiḥ sma nayanti BhKir_9.71c
GK19bhakiriu:3826: saṃtāpe diśatu śivaḥ śivāṃ prasaktim BhKir_5.50b
GK19bhakiriu:3830: saṃdhatte bhṛśam aratiṃ hi sadviyogaḥ BhKir_5.51d
GK19bhakiriu:3889: sāmi majjati ravau na vireje BhKir_9.5c
GK19bhakiriu:3898: sā lakṣmīr upakurute yayā pareṣām BhKir_7.28d
GK19bhakiriu:3904: sā saṃhṛteva parivṛttim iyāya rātriḥ BhKir_9.74d
GK19bhakiriu:3924: sukham ujjhanti na dhāma māninaḥ BhKir_2.20d
GK19bhakiriu:3930: sutaṃ pāṇḍor vīraṃ jaladam iva bhāsvān abhiyayau BhKir_18.45d
GK19bhakiriu:3932: sutā na yūyaṃ kim u tasya rājñaḥ BhKir_3.13a
GK19bhakiriu:3942: suyodhanaṃ vā na guṇair atītāḥ BhKir_3.13b
GK19bhakiriu:3968: susahaṃ babhūva na ca siddhatāpasaiḥ BhKir_12.16d
GK19bhakiriu:3971: suhṛdaḥ sakhāyam iva taṃ marutaḥ BhKir_6.3d
GK19bhakiriu:3982: sotkaṇṭhaṃ kim api pṛthāsutaḥ pradadhyau BhKir_5.51c
GK19bhakiriu:3993: skhalati hy atra tathā bhṛśaṃ mano me BhKir_13.6b
GK19bhakiriu:4001: stimitam amarabhartur draṣṭum akṣṇāṃ sahasram BhKir_6.47d
GK19bhakiriu:4003: stutir iti jagade hareḥ sūnunā BhKir_18.21d
GK19bhakiriu:4018: sthitāya te tatpataye namo namaḥ BhKir_18.41d
GK19bhakiriu:4019: sthitim aprāpya mṛge gataḥ praṇāśam BhKir_13.33b
GK19bhakiriu:4051: smayata iva sma madhuṃ nidāghakālaḥ BhKir_10.36d
GK19bhakiriu:4054: smartuṃ diśanti na divaḥ surasundarībhyaḥ BhKir_5.28d
GK19bhakiriu:4055: smartuṃ na śakyaḥ kim utādhikartum BhKir_3.44b
GK19bhakiriu:4064: srajaṃ na kācid vijahau jalāvilāṃ BhKir_8.37c
GK19bhakiriu:4073: svadhāmnā lokānāṃ tam upari kṛtasthānam amarās BhKir_18.47c
GK19bhakiriu:4078: svam iva puruṣakāraṃ śailam abhyāsasāda BhKir_5.52d
GK19bhakiriu:4083: svayaṃ saṃrādhyaivaṃ śatamakham akhaṇḍena tapasā BhKir_10.63a

GK19bhakiriu:4099: hantā gurur yasya sa jāmadagnyaḥ BhKir_3.18b
GK19bhakiriu:4103: harati mano madhurā hi yauvanaśrīḥ BhKir_10.17d
GK19bhakiriu:4124: hitaṃ manohāri ca durlabhaṃ vacaḥ BhKir_1.4d
GK19bhakiriu:4125: hitān na yaḥ saṃśṛṇute sa kiṃprabhuḥ BhKir_1.5b
GK19bhakiriu:4126: hite niyojyaḥ khalu bhūtim icchatā BhKir_14.8c
GK19bhakiriu:4133: hṛtasya śeṣān iva kuṅkumasya tān BhKir_8.34c
GK19bhakiriu:4134: hṛtā guṇair asya bhayena vā munes BhKir_14.61a
GK19bhakiriu:4136: hṛtāḥ pralobhād iva vegibhir jalaiḥ BhKir_8.39b
GK19bhakiriu:4142: hṛdayam ahṛdayā na nāma pūrvaṃ BhKir_10.47c
